title: Love's Long Journey
description: Alternate cover and format for Love Comes Softly by Janette OkeISBN#:0-87123-315-0 [0871233150]Join the Davis family once again on a journey filled with love and hope, heartache and happiness... and an unquenchable faith in the Lord.In this book, Marty and Clark's daughter, Missie, sets out on a wagon train with her husband, Willie LaHaye. As Missie and Willie face the hardships of the trail and discover that their first child is on the way, the elation of their new adventure begins to wear thin.Missie must learn to live with a constant, draining sense of fear, homesickness, and deprivation. Even the joy of reaching their new home is short-lived when cattle rustlers steal their herd. This latest hardship forces them to live in a tiny sod home until they can get back on their feet again. Can Missie's faith withstand these trials?
author: Janette Oke
